stocker.views.group_required module¶

class stocker.views.group_required.AccessMixin¶

Bases: object

‘Abstract’ mixin that gives access mixins the same customizable functionality.

get_login_url()¶

Override this method to customize the login_url.

get_redirect_field_name()¶

Override this method to customize the redirect_field_name.

handle_no_permission(request)¶
login_url = None¶
no_permissions_fail(request=None)¶

Called when the user has no permissions and no exception was raised. This should only return a valid HTTP response. By default we redirect to login.

raise_exception = False¶
redirect_field_name = 'next'¶
redirect_unauthenticated_users = False¶
